title: Apple expanding presence in South Korea with two new retail stores coming soon
content:
Apple will open at least two new retail stores in Seoul, South Korea, in the near future, as the company is now hiring more employees for another location in the country.

more…

description: Apple will open at least two new retail stores in Seoul in the near future, as the company is hiring more employees for another location.
